paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses various TTR variants, particularly focusing on the Val122Ile variant and its implications in amyloid deposition and related diseases.

patients.phenotype: associated with cardiac amyloid deposition late in life

functional_data.summary: The V122I variant is associated with amyloidogenic potential and similar thermodynamic and kinetic stabilities compared to wild-type TTR.

variants.additional_notes: The study emphasizes the importance of the V122I variant in the context of TTR amyloidosis.
key_quotes: both of which are associated with cardiac amyloid deposition late in life.

functional_data.summary: The F87M/L110M variant is monomeric by design and was characterized in the study.

variants.additional_notes: This variant was included for comparative analysis but lacks detailed clinical data.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant TTR variants were extracted from the main text.
